title: Server/client problems are noticable again.
body:
Dear Riot employees I do notice that client in EUNE is lagging again. It all starts to look just like b4 all that mess that happened like one week eago (this one with malfuncioning server). I dont want to start panic, but maybe (just maybe) it would be good to check overall network condition b4 it will escalate like last time.

Respect  to your hard work

Your customer

replies.body: euw is having bad ingame lag as well it's not just eune
Not just in game. Also pre game: can't even get IN a lobby due to errors in the client.
Glad to know it, that may just imply patch problems then, and it would be... well... better if something. I do hope thats nothing major.

I don't have too much visibility on EU issues, but I haven't heard anything.  Can you run a traceroute for me with [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) so we can get a better analysis of where the hiccups are coming from?  Trace it to 31.186.224.42 for about 5 minutes.  Remove the IP portion on the first 2 rows, and let me know what you find.
